channel.title: Where to post webclients for free?
channel.description: Exactly as stated above... i am not in the budget to buy a website or anything... so im wondering what are some good free websites that i can add a webclient/forums too?

okay so im using webs.com already… (so far i like it ) but now i have a new problem… can you guys all look at it in the server help? Its the webclient coding help. Any help would be appreciated

item.title: Where to post webclients for free?
item.dc:creator: @cocky cocky
item.description:
@cocky wrote:

well whats a good webhost?

EDIT: Okay so im using this webhost:

Free Web Hosting

100% Free Web Hosting by 000webhost | Host Your Website For Free

Join more than 16 million existing users who already hosting their websites on our cloud-powered free web hosting platform. We offer free website hosting with PHP, MySQL, free website builder and absolutely no ads! 000webhost.com web hosting will...

and i made a page there and on their home site i posted this code for my webclient:

[code]

Pvp-Respawn!!!

 

document.write('id=game '); document.write('width="100%" '); document.write('height="100%" '); document.write('alt="Please visit http://yoursite.com/ifnotworking.html if it wont load" '); document.write('archive=https://www.dropbox.com/s/8zcw00l5wm09720/client.jar '); document.write('code=RunClient.class '); document.write('mayscript>');
[/code]

but on the website it just shows up as that… no webclient just exactly what the code is… why?

EDIT AGAIN: I just realized it says ‘paste html code’ in there… okay so i posted that code into the ‘paste html code’ and now this shows up on the website:

document.write('id=game '); document.write('width="100%" '); document.write('height="100%" '); document.write('alt="Please visit http://yoursite.com/ifnotworking.html if it wont load" '); document.write('archive=https://www.dropbox.com/s/8zcw00l5wm09720/client.jar '); document.write('code=RunClient.class '); document.write('mayscript>');

Read full topic
